data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: Everything is political. I will never be a politician or even think political. Me just deal with life and nature. That is the greatest thing to me.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: I don't know how to live good. I only know how to suffer.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: Live for yourself and you will live in vain; live for others, and you will live again.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: Love the life you live, live the life you love.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: My future is righteousness.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: Put your vision to reality.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: Road of life is rocky and you may stumble too, so while you talk about me, someone else is judging you.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: The people who were trying to make this world worse are not taking the day off. Why should I?

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: Truth is the light, so you never give up the fight.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: When the race gets hard to run. It means you just can't take the peace.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: When the root is strong, the fruit is sweet.

data.author: Sigmund Freud
data.quote: The ego is not master in its own house.

data.author: Sigmund Freud
data.quote: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.

data.author: Sherlock Holmes
data.quote: The world is full of obvious things which nobody by any chance ever observes.

data.author: Sherlock Holmes
data.quote: There is nothing more deceptive than an obvious fact.

data.author: Nikola Tesla
data.quote: Be alone, that is the secret of invention; be alone, that is when ideas are born.

data.author: Nikola Tesla
data.quote: Of all things, I liked books best.

data.author: Tao Tzu
data.quote: When goodness is lost, it is replaced by morality.

data.author: Tao Tzu
data.quote: He who knows, does not speak. He who speaks, does not know.

data.author: Benjamin Graham
data.quote: Those who do not remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
